channel.title: Neurodive on neurodive
channel.description: Recent content in Neurodive on neurodive

item.title: Certified Autist
item.description:
one time i told someone i was autistic

and she said, don’t say that about yourself!

oh. ok.

to be fair, that was before i became

an official, card-carrying autist

certified, verified, bona fide

i can show you my credentials

see this paper right here?

F84.0 Autism Spectrum Disorder

it took me 27 years to earn that

i am very proud!

i believe the doctor’s exact words were

there’s definitely something going on there
